API Reference¶

This section contains detailed API documentation for all public functions, classes, and modules in the Rule Engine.

Main Entry Points¶

Note

API documentation with autodoc is currently disabled. The following sections will be enabled once autodoc is re-enabled:

  • services

  • common

  • domain

  • exceptions

Services¶

Services are documented here. See Quick Start Guide for usage examples.

Common Utilities¶

Common utilities are documented here. See Overview for architecture details.

Domain Models¶

Domain models are documented here. See Overview for more information.

Exceptions¶

Exception classes are documented in the common utilities section.

Note

API documentation with autodoc will be enabled once import issues are resolved. For now, see the source code docstrings and usage examples.
